downloadTitle: Planning Microsoft Teams Android devices - Module 2
downloadDescription: Learn how to plan and deploy Microsoft Teams Android devices for your organization.

downloadFile.name: Module 2 - Planning Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx

detailsSection: Learn how to select the right devices for your users and spaces, deploy devices throughout your organization, and understand how to create resource accounts and assign phone numbers.
detailsSection_file_name: Module 2 - Planning Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
